foodPotency.description: A skewer of mushrooms and poultry. Fresh poultry is complimented by fragrant mushrooms. Don't be picky, chow down!
foodPotency.effect: Restores 9% of Max HP and 1,000 HP to the selected character.

foodPotency.description: A skewer of mushrooms and poultry. All the best the wild has to offer are pierced on just one stick.
foodPotency.effect: Restores 10% of Max HP and 1,200 HP to the selected character.

foodPotency.description: A skewer of mushrooms and poultry. At first glance it's hard to tell which is which.
foodPotency.effect: Restores 8% of Max HP and 800 HP to the selected character.

name: Fruity Skewers
description: Kaeya's specialty. A chewy skewer with a rich sweet aftertaste.Wait...Is this really the smell of fruit?
effect: Restores 16% of Max HP and an additional 1,350 HP.
